title: YAWL Build Timings Schema
description: Append-only JSON Lines format for build timing metrics and trend analysis

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when build completed

elapsed_sec.description: Total build + test execution time in seconds

test_count.description: Total number of unit tests run (not including skipped)

test_failed.description: Number of failed tests in this build

success.description: Overall build success status (true = no failures)
